name: Please visit our NEW user friendly site @ www.sneakerthings.com
description:
* ONLY UK RETAILER OF THIS PRODUCT!

Complete set. Includes 8 oz. Premium Sneaker Solution and handcrafted Standard Sneaker Cleaning Brush with laser-etched design on handle. All intimately packaged in NORT designed JASON MARKK sneaker box.
Art direction by legendary New York graffiti artist Stash and his Recon designer Jared Liner.


8 oz. Premium Sneaker Solution Nort Ltd Edt Bottle
Does not contain any harsh chemicals or abrasives
98.3% Natural and completely biodegradable
Safe on all colors and materials
Effectively cleans and conditions
Cleans over 50 pairs of sneakers

Standard Sneaker Cleaning Brush
Synthetic bristle
Handcrafted wood block brush
Laser Marked Jason Markk X Nort logo's on handle
Excellent for tackling dirt on midsoles
Great for all-around cleaning
Tough on stubborn stains


NOTE: When cleaning PREMIUM LEATHER, SUEDE, COTTON MESH and OTHER DELICATE MATERIALS, take extra care and be gentle. We highly recommend using a JASON MARKK PREMIUM SNEAKER CLEANING BRUSH. The softer hog bristles are better suited for use on delicate surfaces.

name: Limited Edition 'Tiffany' Sneaker Photograph Print ( Colour Or Black & White )
description:
